verses.roman:
tabe mahāprabhura mane santoṣa ha-ilā
sāri kari' dui pāśe sabāre vasāilā

synonyms: tabe—thereafter; mahāprabhura—of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; mane—in the mind; santoṣa ha-ilā—there was satisfaction; sāri kari'—making a line; dui pāśe—on two sides; sabāre—all of them; vasāilā—made to sit.
translation: After this incident, Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu was very much satisfied. He then asked all of the devotees to sit down in two lines on both sides.
